item.title: [Quick Transmigration] The Delicate Little Beauty Keeps Getting Caught
item.volume: Arc 1: Tycoon Boss Gong × Pure Little Male Servant Shou
item.description: 【Delicate, soft, pretty little shou × paranoid, psychotic villain gong】 Dark room, forced confinement, obsessive pampering. Shen Yu has bound to a system. His task is to enter various mission worlds and stop anomalous data from causing a world collapse. He’s been completing the missions beautifully, except… the process seems a bit off— A mentally unstable financial magnate, eyes blood-red, holds him by the waist on the bed and murmurs hoarsely: “Don’t go.” A top award-winning actor bends close, lowering his head to drop a kiss by his ear: “You really are beautiful like this.” The sound of metal chains clatters— The chieftain of a beautiful sea-serpent race coils around his trembling, tearful body… It’s 1v1. Sweet, sweet, sweet.
